text.text_translated: One night in 2003, Suzanne Collins watched TV. She looked at different shows. At that time, there was a war in Iraq. She could only find two types of shows on TV. One type was a show about real people. In these shows, young people tried to win a million dollars. The other shows were news about the war. Suzanne says the two ideas mixed together in her head. This was a strange and bad feeling. Then, she had the idea for The Hunger Games.

best_attempt.text_translated:
One night in 2003, Suzanne Collins watched TV. She looked at different shows. At that time, there was a war in Iraq.

She could only find two types of shows on TV. One type was a 'reality' show. In these shows, young people tried to win a million dollars. The other shows were news about the war.

Suzanne says the two ideas mixed together in her head. This was a strange and bad feeling. Then, she had the idea for The Hunger Games.
